titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the "Robert Kurtz Rodibaugh United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 104-781.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 275.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest asked unanimous consent to consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Proceedings on the passage of H.R. 3576 were vacated. Agreed to without objection.
Mr. Gilchrest asked unanimous consent to consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Passed House amended. Designates the United States courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the Robert K. Rodibaugh United States Bankruptcy Courthouse.
